mapper.insert: insert into TB_Appraiser(userSeqNo, email, company, responsibilityName, phoneNumber) values(#{userSeqNo}, #{email}, #{company}, #{responsibilityName}, #{phoneNumber})

insert into TB_Implementer(userSeqNo, email, docNumber, implementerResponsibilityName, implementerNumber) values(#{userSeqNo}, #{email}, #{docNumber}, #{implementerResponsibilityName}, #{implementerNumber})
insert into TB_Cities(userSeqNo, email, department, representativeName, phoneNumber, code) values(#{userSeqNo}, #{email}, #{department}, #{representativeName}, #{phoneNumber}, #{code})

insert into TB_User(userType, userId, userPassword, userAuthority, delCheck, regdate, userEnabled) values(#{userType}, #{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userAuthority}, #{delCheck}, #{regdate}, #{userEnabled})
mapper.select: SELECT seqNo FROM TB_User WHERE userId='${userId}'
